dialogue.text: Step 1: Have a fishing rod. Depending on the quality of the fishing rod it might be easier to fish. Some fishing rods are unsuitable in certain hazardous environments
Step 2: Have some bait. Be sure to have the correct bait for the fish you want
Step 3: Cast your bait into the water and wait till a fish appears
Step 4: Be sure to nab the fish when you see it by your bait
Step 5: Here come's the hard part. Be sure to control your amount of strength when trying to reel in the fish
If you don't the fish will escape. Try to match your strength to the fish so it tires out and eventually reel it in.
